     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Disorderly American Cities &nbsp;

     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21800341">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800341">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800341">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800341">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800341" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21800344">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800344">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800344">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly journal articles?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800344">
          <div id="boxatt21800344" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25279058">
              <a id="link_25279058" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279058,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Disorderly American Cities', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279059">
              <a id="link_25279059" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279059,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Disorderly American Cities', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279061">
              <a id="link_25279061" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279061,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Disorderly American Cities', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25281097">
              <a id="link_25281097" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25281097,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Disorderly American Cities', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811735}); ">
               Sociological Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, dissertations and more in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences. Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21803465">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21803465">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21803465">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I assess a journal?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21803465">
          <div id="boxatt21803465" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25281116">
              <a id="link_25281116" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25281116,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Disorderly American Cities', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016968}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google the author's name and/or the journal name.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25281117">
              <a id="link_25281117" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25281117,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Disorderly American Cities', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974158}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Tells how many times a work has been cited.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25281114">
              <a id="link_25281114" href="http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25281114,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Disorderly American Cities', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974165}); ">
               UlrichsWeb Periodicals Directory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is peer-reviewed or not, on international periodicals. It covers all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5775852" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21800346">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800346">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800346">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800346">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Help with annotated bibliographies
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Visit Purdue's
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
             <em>
              Online Writing Lab
             </em>
            </a>
            for definitions and
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
             format
            </a>
            of an annotation.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800346" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21800347">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800347">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800347">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800347">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800347" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
